data.text: @write2run Right?! It definitely makes a huge difference in my level of comfort in general at the school but *especially* with masks coming off.
@AllisonB Good for him! You and Zach are raising him right (and thank you for that).
@AllisonB What a great heart your kid has. Good job, parents, for encouraging him!
@write2run And it helps tremendously that his school has a vaccine requirement, is a smaller community, and he is boosted *and had covid* so my fear is slightly less?

@write2run ❤️ Thank you. It’s such a weird time. He’s never been around school without a mask because this is his first year at his new school! So there is a part of me (I hate to admit it and sound anti-mask, because you KNOW I’m not) that’s excited for the possibility of no masks?
